title: 209C-Viking Legends: Black Widow
itunes:title: 209C-Viking Legends: Black Widow
description:
Kjartan and Gudrun were always meant to be together, but when the former gets waylaid in a foreign kingdom with a beautiful princess, the latter needs to make other plans. Of course, she accepts the proposal of their mutual best friend, sparking a love triangle that could prove deadly.

The creature is a good dog! Who has to die!

The store: https://myths.link/store

The membership: https://www.mythpodcast.com/membership

The episode post: https://myths.link/209c

The saga: https://myths.link/gudrunsaga

--

"Um Pepino" by Blue Dot Sessions

"Broken" by Michael Vignola

"Undying" by Blue Dot Sessions
